original_text: So this is what they did to catch Jesus. They sent people to ask him difficult questions. These people pretended to be honest, but they wanted to deceive Jesus. They wanted to make him say something wrong. Then they would take him to the ruler of the city to punish him.
korean_text: 이에 그들이 엿보다가 예수를 총독의 다스림과 권세 아래에 넘기려 하여 정탐들을 보내어 그들로 스스로 의인인 체하며 예수의 말을 책잡게 하니

sentences.original_text: So this is what they did to catch Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 예수를 잡기 위해 한 일이 바로 이것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: They sent people to ask him difficult questions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 어려운 질문을 할 사람들을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: These people pretended to be honest
but they wanted to deceive Jesus
They wanted to make him say something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 잘못된 말을 하게 만들고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they would take him to the ruler of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 그를 도시의 통치자에게 데려갈 것입니다
